department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: To procure meteorological instruments **precision rain / snowfall surface observing apparatus*** and related services for specific end-user organizations.
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
RFP Snow Depth Sensors - Invitation to Tender
=============================================

### Tender Information

**Title**: RFP Snow Depth Sensors

**Reference Number**: WS4276229952-Doc4285658554

**Amendment No.**: 1 (Subject to issuance of amendments)

### Tender Closing Details

**Publication Date**: November 1, 2023

**Tender Closing**: December 8, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Expected Contract Start Date**: December 21, 2023

**Expected Contract End Date**: No date specified

**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

**Procurement Method**: Competitive Selective Tendering

### Tender Description

Mrepresentations are invited for a contract to supply and install snow depth sensors. Successfully proposals will be selected on the basis of a combination of technical merit and price. For full tender details, please download the Tender Package from the attached URL link.

### Eligible Respondents

* Suppliers of meteorological instrumentation
* Companies located in regions covered under one of the Canada's trade agreements, as detailed below.

### Trade Agreements

The supply of goods and services under this contract is subject to the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

### Regions of Opportunity

Although there are no regional opportunities associated with this contract recommendation, businesses based in Canada are eligible to participate.

### Regions of Delivery

The contract delivery location is Canada.

### Contracting and End-User Entities

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* End-User Entity: Department of the Environment (ECCC)
* Address: 200 Boulevard Sacré-Coeur, Gatineau, Quebec J8X4C6, Canada

### Contact Information

To obtain bid documents and seek clarification on the procurement requirements, please contact:
Shannon Brewster
TPSGC-PWGSC@tbs-sct.gc.ca

### Additional Information

Full tender documentation and supplier's guidelines for the submission of responses are available online.
